description:
It’s a sweet fragile cage--

Shirley lost her parents in an accident. Her only remaining family is Ralph, her twin brother. Shirley is determined to protect her brother in her parent’s absence but is shocked when she hears rumors of him having a lover. Although it’s forbidden, her feelings for him swell and become indecent. Is this a dream?>
